title: metatargetr 0.0.6

Fixed detectmysnap() passing NA jsonlite::fromJSON() wrong script tag selected. Added input validation every step (NA/NULL/empty checks, split result check, regex match check, pre-parse check) failures produce clear error messages instead cryptic JSON parse errors. Fixed browser_session_active() checking R-side flags without verifying Chrome actually responsive. now pings browser lightweight evaluation. Chrome crashed (‚ÄúReconnecting chrome process‚Äù), stale session automatically cleaned callers create fresh one instead reusing dead session.
